props.hideInput: Display the icon only without the input (file names)
props.showSize: Sets the displayed size of selected file(s). When using **true** will default to 1000 displaying (**kB**, **MB**, **GB**) while 1024 will display (**KiB**, **MiB**, **GiB**).
props.truncateLength: The length of a filename before it is truncated with ellipsis
